name: Moussaka
description: Traditional Greek casserole with layers of eggplant, potatoes, and seasoned ground beef topped with béchamel sauce

name: Souvlaki Platter
description: Grilled skewers of marinated chicken or pork served with tzatziki, pita bread, and a Greek salad

name: Gyro Wrap
description: Slow-roasted seasoned meat wrapped in warm pita with tomatoes, onions, and tzatziki sauce

name: Greek Salad
description: Fresh cucumber, tomatoes, red onion, olives, and feta cheese dressed with olive oil and herbs

name: Pastitsio
description: Baked pasta with ground beef and rich béchamel sauce, flavored with cinnamon and nutmeg

name: Stuffed Grape Leaves (Dolmades)
description: Grape leaves filled with seasoned rice and herbs, served with lemon and tzatziki
